description:
Enshou was the warrior prince of Burei, known as "The Gunpowder Prince". Following the Altana incident that destroyed his home planet, he joins the http://anidb.net/ch96930 [Altana Liberation Army] and becomes one of its leaders.
However, he plans to destroy every last of Altana after an incident involving the death of his lover as part of his selfish suicide attempt. Unfortunately, his selfishness becomes a perfect subject and unwitting pawn to http://anidb.net/ch81990 [Utsuro]`s similar plan, until his defeat at the hands of http://anidb.net/ch1662 [Takasugi Shinsuke]. By the time he began to regret himself for betraying his own friends and lover, he is killed by one of his own men who is fed up of Enshou`s selfishness on sacrificing his own men to death.
Source: Gintama Wiki
name: Enshou
